message: Plus i know have the added advantage, that i can extend this static app as an wsgi/django app.

I deployed a static app tonight, and it worked flawlessly, it's awesome that you can do that, and If in the future it would make sense to host your static apps for very little, i can see myself ep.io becoming my main host
Heh, thanks. The static stuff was added for a quick test page, I think, but glad to know you've found a use for it.
http://boilerplateinc.com/ is a static app hosted by ep.io :)
